idp_mesh_info_v2.lang_idp_mesh_confirm_title: 請按住子節點的WPS按鈕3秒鐘
idp_mesh_info_v2.lang_idp_mesh_fail_title: Connecting to your child node took to longer than expected. Try again.
idp_mesh_info_v2.lang_idp_mesh_pass_title: 子節點已加入您的 Wi-Fi！
idp_mesh_info_v2.lang_idp_mesh_plug_content1: 請等候直到您的 Easy Mesh 裝置完全啟動。請等候 3 分鐘。
idp_mesh_info_v2.lang_idp_mesh_plug_content2: 如果要設定更多的子節點，請確保一次只進行一個，以免發生問題。
